**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 241 4.0 Arcana measures how much you know about arcane magic and creatures. Even if you’re untrained, you can Recall Knowledge. Arcana Untrained General Actions - [Recall Knowledge](/Skills.aspx?ID=5&General=true) about arcane theories; magic traditions; creatures of arcane significance (like dragons and beasts); and the Elemental, Astral, and Shadow Planes. Arcana Trained General Actions - [Decipher Writing](/Skills.aspx?ID=1&General=true) about arcane theory. - [Identify Magic](/Skills.aspx?ID=3&General=true), particularly arcane magic. - [Learn a Spell](/Skills.aspx?ID=4&General=true) from the arcane tradition. - [Tap Ley Line](/Skills.aspx?ID=7&General=true) tapping an arcane ley line Item Bonuses for Arcana
